entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: FyTube - YouTube Without Ads
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$0.99 ‚Üí Free (Free ~ $19.99)Ôºâ

Application Description

Our app connects to YouTube in real-time and allows you to play any video. FyTube has special features such as: playback with the screen locked, as well as other well-known features like: activating subtitles, changing playback speed, full-screen mode, rewinding‚Ä¶ we also added search filters by upload date so you don‚Äôt miss a single video of the topics you love the most! SPECIAL FEATURES PLAYBACK WITH LOCKED SCREEN: This feature allows you to keep listening to the audio of your videos while your device‚Äôs screen is locked, ideal for listening to music or your favorite songs while driving, or when you just want to relax with the audio in the background. How to activate: Simply lock your device‚Äôs screen and you‚Äôll see your player use Play, continuing to listen to the audio of your video without interruption :) Need help using these features? Visit: fydub.com/fytube BASIC FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Full-screen video playback with high-quality videos. ‚Ä¢ Easy-to-use interface, friendly design. ‚Ä¢ Fast forward and rewind your video whenever you want, never miss the most interesting parts. ‚Ä¢ Subtitle activation. ‚Ä¢ Change playback speed to your liking. ‚Ä¢ Search engine with smart filters by upload date: day, week, month, year, all. ‚Ä¢ In each video, you‚Äôll find a related videos section to discover more interesting content. ‚Ä¢ Discover the latest videos and don‚Äôt miss the latest news from around the world. ‚Ä¢ Our app connects directly to YouTube, allowing you to find any video. ‚Ä¢ Enjoy content on any AirPlay-compatible device. ‚Ä¢ VoiceOver available. ‚Ä¢ No user creation required. ‚Ä¢ We don‚Äôt store cache, cookies, or personal data without your authorization, watch your favorite videos safely. ‚Ä¢ Interface available in 29 languages. ‚Ä¢ NO ADS INTERRUPTIONS, NO SUBSCRIPTIONS. Get FyTube with a one-time payment and start a new ad-free, subscription-free video streaming experience. Minimum requirements: ‚Ä¢ iOS 13 or higher. ‚Ä¢ 3G connection or higher. Privacy Policy: https://fydub.com/privacy-policy_fytube Terms of Service: https://fydub.com/terms-of-service_fytube Words related to our application: youtube, youtobe,youtube youtube music,youtube vanced,youtube ad blocker,no subscription, skip youtube ads, music without ad, music no ads, no ads, app youtube, youtube adblocker, without ads,without ads,block popups,ads remover,pop up blocker,ad-block,blocking ads,adblock for youtube,content blocker,ad blockers,ad blocking,ad blocker,been choice,adblocker,ad-blocker,ad block plus,adblock pro,ad free,block ads,adblock browser,Adblock,ad blocker plus,skip youtube,ads,youtube singing,sin anuncios,music without ad,free you tube red,youtube adblocker,ad skip,block ad,free youtube,video-ads,adblocker youtube,abblocker,stop ads If you have any questions on how to use FyTube, visit fydub.com/fytube or write to us, we‚Äôll be happy to assist you, we answer all our emails: fytube@fydub.com FyTube works with YouTube. The YouTube brand and logo are registered trademarks of Google, Inc. All rights reserved. ¬© FyTube¬Æ.
